Package com.github.tadukoo.view.form

Class AbstractForm

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
com.github.tadukoo.view.form.AbstractForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.github.tadukoo.util.pojo.MappedPojo, Form, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
DateForm
public abstract class AbstractForm
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Form
Abstract Form is the default implementation of Form.
Since:
Alpha v.0.2
Version:
Alpha v.0.2.1
Author:
Logan Ferree (Tadukoo)
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractForm

      protected AbstractForm​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> defaultValues)
      Initializes the form. Sets the values map to the passed in map (used for forms that need the default values while running Form.setDefaultFields()), and sets the fields and components maps to new HashMaps.
      Form.setDefaultFields() and createComponents() are then called.
      Parameters:
      defaultValues - The default values map, used for forms that need them during Form.setDefaultFields()

    • AbstractForm

      protected AbstractForm​(com.github.tadukoo.util.pojo.MappedPojo pojo)
      Initializes the form. Sets the values map to the map from the given pojo (used for forms that need the default values while running Form.setDefaultFields()), and sets the fields and components maps to new HashMaps.
      Form.setDefaultFields() and createComponents() are then called.
      Parameters:
      pojo - The pojo containing a map, to be used for default values for forms that need them during Form.setDefaultFields()
